Header.title: Unleash your potential
Header.paragraph: Professional, Evidence-Based Baseball Training in Miami

About.paragraph: Founded by JJ Eduardo, The Baseball Medic blends Division I playing experience with medical expertise to deliver advanced baseball performance training. As a current medical student and two-time D1 athlete, JJ brings a unique understanding of how the body moves, heals, and performs under pressure.

Services.name: Batting Practice Sessions
Services.text: Cage-based hitting sessions focused on swing mechanics, bat speed, and approach. Athletes work on contact consistency, timing, and power using data-driven feedback and drills that translate directly to game performance.

Services.name: Defensive Training Sessions
Services.text: On-field defensive instruction with emphasis on footwork, throwing accuracy, and reaction time. Sessions target position-specific fundamentals, with particular focus on outfield defense and first-step explosiveness.

Services.name: Strength & Agility Training
Services.text: Improve speed, coordination, and athletic efficiency through tailored movement patterns and strength exercises. Each session blends baseball-specific agility, mobility, and power work for balanced performance.

Services.name: Return-to-Play Program
Services.text: For athletes recovering from injury or extended time off. This program bridges the gap between rehab and full competition through progressive workload management, stability drills, and monitored reconditioning.

Services.name: Video Analysis
Services.text: Receive personalized swing or throwing analysis from recorded footage. Each review includes technical breakdown, performance cues, and corrective drills designed to accelerate progress between in-person sessions.

Services.name: Private Training Packages
Services.text: One-on-one training combining offense, defense, and strength elements. Customized sessions are built around your individual goals, with clear metrics and progress tracking throughout your program.

Pricing.title: PRICING & PACKAGES
Pricing.subtitle: Clear, flexible options for one-on-one, small groups, and bundled programs.

Features.title: Assessment First
Features.text: Every player starts with a movement and performance assessment — evaluating throwing mechanics, mobility, and baseline speed or strength. This helps tailor training to your body and goals from day one.

Features.title: Individualized Programming
Features.text: No cookie-cutter workouts here. Each program is customized based on your position, skill level, and in-season schedule to help you progress safely and efficiently.

Features.title: Injury-Smart Design
Features.text: Built by a former Division I athlete and medical student, The Baseball Medic emphasizes proper workload management and arm-care principles to prevent injuries and maximize performance.

Features.title: Progress Tracking
Features.text: We measure results through data — from exit velocity and sprint speed to throwing power and agility drills — so you can see your progress and stay motivated.
